titleStmt.title: Gods eye on His Israel, or, A passage of Balaam, out of Numb. 23, 21 containing matter very seasonable and suitable to the times : expounded and cleared from antinomian abuse, with application to the present estate of things with us / by Tho. Gataker ...
titleStmt.author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. G. for Foulke Clifton ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
